author: stefan2
msg: Offload the creation and configuration of the connection object to the
respective worker thread / process in svnserve.
(serve_socket): simple wrapper around serve(), adding connection init
(serve_thread_t): pass a socket instead of a connection to the thread
(main): use the new wrapper to offload work from the main() loop

author: dennisl
msg: Add missing license headers. This component now passes the checks done by RAT.

author: trawick
msg: Hard-code the same address family on the server side as it already
is on the client side; otherwise, connect will fail on dual-stack
(The socket setup could stand to be rewritten!)
